deity.name: The Hunger
deity.title: It of Atrophy
deity.symbol: Grey points on a black field

customProperties.Domains: (This overrides the display text for domains, and can include {@i @tags}. The main "domain" property is used for list sorting and filtering, so should contain plain text only.)
customProperties.Typical Worshipers: Creatures who spend {@dice 1d6} days in the presence of the metaphysical influence exuded by the Outsider
